Strings.Text: {scroll 2}A fixture that lights the\nhour plate of the clock.
{scroll 2}{cut 6}There's a key hole on the\nornamental copper plate.{clear 0}Will you use the \n{color 1}{string 119}{color 0}? {branch 0}
{scroll 2}{cut 6}There's a key hole on the\nornamental copper plate.
{scroll 2}You no longer need this\nkey.{clear 0}Will you discard it?\n{branch 0}
